original: 東平任城人，曹魏官員。歷仕曹叡、三少帝，是當時著名文人之一，亦曾參與編撰史書，但大多未能傳世。
text: Dongping was appointed as a city resident and Cao Wei official. Li Shi Cao Rui and San Shao Di were one of the famous literati at the time. They also participated in the compilation of history books, but most of them were not handed down.
